item.text: Ask the Lord for rain in the season of the late spring rains—the Lord who causes thunderstorms—and he will give everyone showers of rain and green growth in the field.

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="08655" class="">household gods</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="01696" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="0205" class="">wickedness</st>, the <st data-num="07080" class="">soothsayers</st> have <st data-num="02372" class="">seen</st> a <st data-num="08267" class="">lie</st>, and the <st data-num="02472" class="">dreamers</st> have <st data-num="01696" class="">disclosed</st> <st data-num="07723" class="">emptiness</st> and <st data-num="05162" class="">give comfort</st> <st data-num="01892" class="">in vain</st>. <st data-num="05921 03651">Therefore</st> the people <st data-num="05265" class="">set out</st> <st data-num="03644" class="">like</st> <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> and <st data-num="06031" class="">become scattered</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> they have <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="07462" class="">shepherd</st>.<n id="2" />

“I am enraged at the shepherds and will punish the lead goats.

“For the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has brought blessing to his flock, the house of Judah, and will transform them into his majestic warhorse.

<st data-num="04480" class="">From</st> him will <st data-num="03318 03162">come</st> the <st data-num="06438" class="">cornerstone</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03489" class="">wall peg</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> <st data-num="07198" class="">bow</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="05065" class="">ruler</st>.<n id="3" />
And they will be like warriors trampling the mud of the streets in battle. They will fight, for the Lord will be with them, and will defeat the enemy cavalry.

“I (says the Lord) will strengthen the kingdom of Judah and deliver the people of Joseph and will bring them back because of my compassion for them. They will be as though I had never rejected them, for I am the Lord their God, and therefore I will hear them.
The Ephraimites will be like warriors and will rejoice as if they had drunk wine. Their children will see it and rejoice; they will celebrate in the things of the Lord.

I will <st data-num="08319" class="">signal</st> for them and <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> them, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> I have already <st data-num="06299" class="">redeemed</st> them; then they will <st data-num="07235" class="">become</st> as <st data-num="07235" class="">numerous</st> <st data-num="03644" class="">as</st> they <st data-num="07235" class="">were</st> before.

Though I <st data-num="02232" class="">scatter</st><n id="1" /> them among the <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st>, they will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> in <st data-num="04801" class="">far-off places</st>—they <st data-num="0854" class="">and</st> their <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> will <st data-num="02421" class="">survive</st> and <st data-num="07725" class="">return</st>.

I will <st data-num="07725" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> from <st data-num="0776 04714">Egypt</st> and <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> them from <st data-num="0804" class="">Assyria</st>.<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">lands</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> and <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st>, and there will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">be enough room</st> for them.
The Lord will cross the sea of storms and will calm its turbulence. The depths of the Nile will dry up, the pride of Assyria will be humbled, and the domination of Egypt will be no more.
Thus I will strengthen them by my power, and they will walk about in my name,” says the Lord.
